name: T-minus —
description:
-WARNING THIS GAME CONTENTS FLASHING LIGHTS-

Submitted for GMTK2021 game jam 

-controls-

-WASD to move 

-Left Click to Fire

-Bar at the bottom is health/ammo-

-Countdown in the middle is until the power goes out/back on-

your ammo and health are connected, you can not regen health while firing or when the power is out.

A moment of reprieve as you catch your breath. Your wounds slowly healing, you are the last one left, you think back to fallen comrades, it fills you with rage. You see the enemy approaching, you unleash a volley of bullets. Your gun shaking you to your core, this really is your last stand. You go berserk as your rate of fire increases, mowing down enemies. You can not keep this up forever, you need to stop and breathe and let the armour heal you, the lights flicker, the powers cut. it won't heal you now. this is it, you need to RUN OR DIE!
